Class BallsSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • BallsSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gui.Simulable

    public class BallsSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements gui.Simulable
    This class BallsSimulator display the balls and their movements on the simulator screen. <\b>

    To do that, we need:

  • A GUISimulator.
  • A set of balls.
    • <\p>
